Chap. 29 - Literature for a Finished Work

     Literature That Explains the Signs of the Times.--Just now, when people are thinking seriously, [THE INSTRUCTION IN THIS ARTICLE WAS PUBLISHED SHORTLY AFTER THE SAN FRANCISCO EARTHQUAKE.] literature on the meaning of the signs of the times, wisely circulated, will have a telling effect in behalf of the truth. At this time, when awful calamities are sweeping away the most costly structures as if by a breath of fire from heaven, many sinners are afraid, and stand trembling before God. Now is our opportunity to make known the truth to them.
